lines.text:
[recalling how a nude take-out waitress with very large buttocks forced herself on him]
Yeah, what a piece of ass.
Well, let's just say she was, ah... big. All over.
Really man, I never knew love making could be so, ahem... physical.
There ain't a woman around who don't love the sound of a zipper comin' down...
[he barely finishes the line when the nude take-out waitress throws him on the waterbed and forces herself on him by mounting him with her very large buttocks ]

[after a take-out waitress praises his van]
Hey, you wanna go share a joint on the waterbed?
Waterbed? Really? I just love waterbeds.
It's right there in the back.
I really don't have time for a joint. But I got some time for a...
[the take-out waitress steps out from behind the counter, making Bobby gasp upon noticing her very large buttocks on her otherwise thin body]
Well, what are you, chickening out, or we gotta match?
Yeah, I gotta match... your face and my ass.
